Summary: A bright beam of light in the sky
divs: Sighting Details As my wife and I were proceeding home from our daughter's house ,we both observed a bright light ,brighter than anything I ever saw .Although it was daylight ,it was as bright as the sun. We proceeded south on rt395 between exit 87 and 86 as we saw the light going south in the sky which was perfectly clear. The object made a 90deg right turn and proceeded for a few seconds then made a 90deg left turn,proceeded south until it disappeared afew seconds later
